homework6

Class HashedLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • homework6.HashedLibrary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HashedLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The HashedLibrary class contains information for all books saved in the electronic database.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addBook

        public void addBook(java.lang.String title,
           java.lang.String author,
           java.lang.String publisher,
           java.lang.String isbn)
             throws DuplicateKeyException
        Records a book into the hash and print a message if successfully recorded. If another book with the same key is already recorded, throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        title -
        author -
        publisher -
        isbn -
        Precondition:
        The book being added is not already recorded in the library
        Throws:
        DuplicateKeyException - Indicates that there is another book with the same key already recorded

      • addAllBookInfo

        public void addAllBookInfo(java.lang.String fileName)
        Using the fileName provided, parses a file for XML file names. Adds a record for each XML file name provided, and prints a message if a Book id recorded successfully.
        Parameters:
        fileName -
        Precondition:
        The books being added are not already recorded in the library
        Throws:
        DuplicateKeyException - Indicates that there is another book with the same key already recorded

      • getBookByisbn

        public Book getBookByisbn(java.lang.String isbn)
        Using the isbn as the key, looks for a particular book in the library
        Parameters:
        isbn -
        Returns:
        the Book reference if it exists, null otherwise

      • printCatalog

        public void printCatalog()
        Prints all the books stored in the library

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of books in the library
        Returns:
        the number of books in the library
